welcome.title: Learn Languages Your Way
welcome.subtitle: Be proactive. Find sentences that matter to you. Note them. Master them.

philosophy.title: Your Journey, Your Sentences
philosophy.subtitle: Don't wait for apps to show you what to learn. Search for real content — movies, songs, conversations — and capture the sentences that resonate with you.
philosophy.tip1: Watch a show? Note that perfect phrase.
philosophy.tip2: Read an article? Save the expression that clicked.
philosophy.tip3: Heard something cool? Write it down.

method.title: The Proactive Method
method.subtitle: Traditional apps feed you random sentences. You'll forget 90% of them. But sentences YOU choose? Those stick.
method.step3: Review daily at your own pace
